title: Episode 29: The Death of JonBen√©t Ramsey: Part 1
description:
On Dec. 26, 1996 the brutal murder of six year old beauty pageant queen JonBenet Ramsey shocked the world. 22 years later and this case remains unsolved. What happened that fateful morning at the Ramsey's lavish Colorado home? Does the 911 call reveal more than intended? Who really wrote the lengthy and suspicious ransom note. There are a lot of unanswered questions, but one thing is for certain. The police did everything wrong from the word "go."

itunes:subtitle: The brutal murder of a six-year-old beauty queen captivated the nation, thrust the family into the spotlight, and 22 years later there are still more questions than answers.
